page.title: 16MRS. GRIGSON'S HOUSE.
page.content: Before{Mrs Grigson}lived in{BroadTown {farm Mr George Henly}a{farmer}lived there.When they moved in there were a few{yew, apple}and{pear}trees.The house isn't a{farm}now.It is now{pink but when they moved it was grey.At the far end of the house it used to be {wattle}and{daub}but it isn't now.In the house there are 13 main rooms and a few small rooms.Also there are six fire places, which are quite old, five bedrooms,1 bathroom with a wooden toilet seat.Some changes were made in 1970.Mrs Grigson's favourite room is the kitchen.The house has an attic. The thatch came off in 1960.The walls of the house are made of chalk, sarson stone and brick.There is a date on the wall that says{1625}and on the chimey it says{1668. }
